mapper.update: create table area_range ( id bigint, name varchar(255), valid boolean default true, primary key (id) ) default charset = utf8
insert into area_range values (1, '全部', true), (2, '0-100m²', true), (3, '100-300m²', true), (4, '300-500m²', true), (5, '500-1000m²', true), (6, '1000m²以上', true)
mapper.select: select id, name from area_range where valid = true order by id asc

select id, name from area_range where valid = true and id in ( select area_range_id as id from office where valid = true and office.building_id = #{building_id} group by area_range_id ) or id = 1 order by id asc
